channel.title: Need help java
channel.description:
when ever i try to run server or run client i get the "java is not recognised as an internal or external command,operable program or batch file. press any key to continue..."
please help thanks

item.title: Need help java
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

[quote=“propker, post:8, topic:239740”][quote author=adu link=topic=316032.msg2510853#msg2510853 date=1225258377]

wasnt what i meant… i meant when i edited client and runserver on other sources was cake but when i do same for the rscd it doesnt work… no need to go ape shit on me lmao…

Are you trying to say you cant get rscd online? or when you change the version of the client it wont let you connect?
[/quote]
Yes thats what im saying nor locally or dedi… just need simple halp =([/quote]

That still hasent answered my question.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help java
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

LOL! thats funny, set paths for rscd…

Paths meaning your Environmental variables which allows your computer to understand the command ‘java’, ‘jar’, ‘javac’ ‘ant’ and tons more. You cant “set your paths” for a specific source, you set your paths for your computer. How? well…

right click computer>praperties

advanced tab> Environmental variables

make a new one named Classpath and the value whoudl be your jdk javas bin folder (or maybe its lib…cant remember)

Read full topic
